title: Project Management Executive
company_name: Công ty Cổ Phần Tư Vấn Đầu Tư Giải Trí VI
job_description:
Meet the build-out and design requirements of the Master Franchisor.
Coordinate all aspects of a project including client relations, developing project budgets and scope of work, permit acquisition, and working with a project team to carry out feasibility assessment, concept development, and design and construction management.
Develop plan for fit-out, M&E and/or refurbishment work for new or existing stores.
Track project milestones and deliverables and produce regular progress reports for management and team members.
Estimate resources, materials and participants needed to achieve project goals; determine and assess needs for additional staff and/or consultants and make the appropriate recruitments if necessary.
Analyze and provide recommendations for the selection of contractors/suppliers, including engineers, architects, construction companies, other technical contractors.
Support all project teams with M&E related activities such as design review, site supervision, and technical problem solving.
Manage all consultants, contractors, suppliers to ensure their work is high quality, reasonably priced, timely and meets all project objectives.
Proactively manage changes in project scope, identify potential crises, and develop and recommend contingency plans.
After fit out/refurbishment is completed, develop maintenance plan and schedule for the store(s).
Organize maintenance teams to carry out work according to the maintenance schedule.
requirements:
Can read and write in English with party is must.
Minimum of 2 years work experience in civil/industrial construction, M&E engineering, project management.
Minimum of 2-year work experience in Retail Project Management.
M&E or construction engineering or architecture education background.
Deep knowledge about ventilation systems and air conditioning systems is a must.
Able to manage multiple projects at once.
